name: Cellar
rules: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

name: Chapel
rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Moat
rules: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

name: Chancellor
rules: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

name: Village
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

name: Woodcutter
rules: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

name: Workshop
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Bureaucrat
rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Feast
rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Gardens
rules: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Militia
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

name: Moneylender
rules: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

name: Remodel
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Smithy
rules: +3 Cards.

name: Spy
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

name: Thief
rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

name: Throne Room
rules: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

name: Council Room
rules: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

name: Festival
rules: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

name: Laboratory
rules: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

name: Library
rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

name: Market
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

name: Mine
rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

name: Witch
rules: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

name: Adventurer
rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

name: Courtyard
rules: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Pawn
rules: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

name: Secret Chamber
rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Great Hall
rules: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

name: Masquerade
rules:
+2 Cards
Each player passes a card from his hand to the left at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Shanty Town
rules: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

name: Steward
rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

name: Swindler
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

name: Wishing Well
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

name: Baron
rules: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

name: Bridge
rules: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Conspirator
rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

name: Coppersmith
rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

name: Ironworks
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

name: Mining Village
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

name: Scout
rules: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Duke
rules: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

name: Minion
rules: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

name: Saboteur
rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

name: Torturer
rules: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

name: Trading Post
rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

name: Tribute
rules: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

name: Upgrade
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Harem
rules: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

name: Nobles
rules: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

name: Embargo
rules: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

name: Haven
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Lighthouse
rules: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

name: Native Village
rules:
+2 Actions, Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. 
 You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

name: Pearl Diver
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Ambassador
rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Fishing Village
rules: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

name: Lookout
rules: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

name: Smugglers
rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

name: Warehouse
rules: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

name: Caravan
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

name: Cutpurse
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

name: Island
rules:
Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.
2 VP

name: Navigator
rules: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Pirate Ship
rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

name: Salvager
rules: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

name: Sea Hag
rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

name: Treasure Map
rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Bazaar
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

name: Explorer
rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

name: Ghost Ship
rules: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

name: Merchant Ship
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

name: Outpost
rules: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

name: Tactician
rules: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

name: Treasury
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Wharf
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

name: Transmute
rules:
Trash a card from your hand.
If it is an...
Action card, gain a Duchy
Treasure card, gain a Transmute
Victory card, gain a Gold

name: Vineyard
rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Apothecary
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Herbalist
rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

name: Scrying Pool
rules:
+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.
Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

name: University
rules:
+2 Actions
You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Alchemist
rules:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

name: Familiar
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player gains a curse.

name: Philosopher's Stone
rules:
When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.
Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

name: Golem
rules:
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.
Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

name: Potion
rules: Worth 1 Potion.

name: Apprentice
rules:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per Coin it costs.
+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

name: Possession
rules:
The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.
Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

name: Loan
rules:
Worth 1 Coin.
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

name: Trade Route
rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat.
Trash a card from your hand.
Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

name: Watchtower
rules:
Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.
When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

name: Bishop
rules:
+1 Coin
+1 <VP>
Trash a card from your hand. +<VP> equal to half its cost in Coins, rounded down.
Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

name: Monument
rules: +2 Coins; +1 <VP>

name: Quarry
rules:
Worth 1 Coin.
While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Talisman
rules:
Worth 1 Coin.
While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

name: Worker's Village
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
+1 Buy

name: City
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

name: Contraband
rules:
Worth 3 Coins.
+1 Buy
When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

name: Counting House
rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

name: Mint
rules:
You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.
When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

name: Mountebank
rules:
+2 Coins
Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

name: Rabble
rules:
+3 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

name: Royal Seal
rules:
Worth 2 Coins.
While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

name: Vault
rules:
+2 Cards
Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.
Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

name: Venture
rules:
Worth 1 Coin.
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

name: Goons
rules:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.

name: Grand Market
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

name: Hoard
rules:
Worth 2 Coins.
While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

name: Bank
rules:
Worth ? Coins.
When you play this, it`s worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

name: Expand
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Forge
rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.

name: King's Court
rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

name: Peddler
rules:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin
During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Platinum
rules: 5 Coins.

name: Bag of Gold
rules:
+1 Action
Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Diadem
rules:
Worth 2 Coins.
When you play this, +1 Coin per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Followers
rules:
+2 Cards
Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Princess
rules:
+1 Buy
While this is in play, cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Trusty Steed
rules:
Choose two: +2 Cards; +2 Actions; +2 Coins; gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.
(The choices must be different)
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Hamlet
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Action.
You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Buy.

name: Fortune Teller
rules:
+2 Coins
Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

name: Menagerie
rules:
+1 Action
Reveal your hand.
If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards.
Otherwise, +1 Card.

name: Farming Village
rules:
+2 Actions
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

name: Horse Traders
rules:
+1 Buy
+3 Coins
Discard 2 Cards
When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

name: Remake
rules: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

name: Tournament
rules:
+1 Action
Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

name: Young Witch
rules:
+2 Cards
Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand.
If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse.
Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 Coins or 3 Coins to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

name: Harvest
rules: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

name: Horn of Plenty
rules:
0 Coins
When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it’s a Victory card, trash this.

name: Hunting Party
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn’t a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Jester
rules:
+2 Coins
Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it’s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

name: Fairgrounds
rules: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

name: Crossroads
rules:
Reveal your hand.
+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

name: Duchess
rules:
+2 Coins
Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.
In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

name: Fool's Gold
rules:
If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, otherwise it's worth 4 Coins.
When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

name: Develop
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Oasis
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Discard a card.

name: Oracle
rules:
Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.
+2 Cards

name: Scheme
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

name: Tunnel
rules:
2 VP [large shield]
When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Jack of all Trades
rules:
Gain a Silver.
Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

name: Noble Brigand
rules:
+1 Coin
When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

name: Nomad Camp
rules:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

name: Silk Road
rules: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

name: Spice Merchant
Trader
rules:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in Coins.
When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

name: Cache
rules:
Worth 3 Coins
When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

name: Cartographer
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

name: Embassy
rules:
+5 Cards
Discard 3 cards.
When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

name: Haggler
rules:
+2 Coins
While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

name: Highway
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
rules:
Worth 1 Coin
When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.
When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

name: Inn
rules:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
Discard 2 cards.
When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Mandarin
rules:
+3 Coins
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

name: Margrave
rules:
+3 Cards
+1 Buy
Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Stables
rules: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Border Village
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

name: Farmland
rules:
2 VP
When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Abandoned Mine
rules: +1 Coin

name: Madman
rules:
+2 Actions
Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.
(This card is not in the supply.)

name: Mercenary
rules:
You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. 
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Ruined Library
rules: +1 Card

name: Ruined Market
rules: +1 Buy

name: Ruined Village
rules: +1 Action

name: Spoils
rules:
3 Coins
When you play this, return it to the Spoils pile.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Survivors
rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

name: Hovel
rules: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

name: Necropolis
rules: +2 Actions

name: Overgrown Estate
rules:
0 Victory
When you trash this, +1 Card.

name: Poor House
rules:
+4 Coins
Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

name: Beggar
rules:
Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

name: Squire
rules:
+1 Coin
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.
When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

name: Vagrant
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

name: Forager
rules:
+1 Action, +1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

name: Hermit
rules:
Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.
When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

name: Market Square
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy
When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Sage
rules:
+1 Action
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Storeroom
rules:
+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

name: Urchin
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.
When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

name: Armory
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Death Cart
rules:
+5 Coins
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.
When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.

name: Feodum
rules:
Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).
When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

name: Fortress
rules:
+1 Card, +2 Actions
When you trash this, put it into your hand.

name: Ironmonger
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it is an…
Action card, +1 Action
Treasure card, +1 Coin
Victory card, +1 Card

name: Marauder
rules: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

name: Procession
rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Rats
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).
When you tash this, +1 Card.

name: Scavenger
rules:
+1 Coins
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

name: Sir Martin
rules:
+2 Buys
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Wandering Minstrel
rules:
+1 Card, +2 Actions
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

name: Band of Misfits
rules:
Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.
This is that card until it leaves play.

name: Bandit Camp
rules:
+1 Card, +2 Actions
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Catacombs
rules:
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.
When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

name: Count
rules:
Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.
Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

name: Counterfeit
rules:
1 Coin
+1 Buy
When you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

name: Cultist
rules:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.
When you trash this, +3 Cards.

name: Dame Anna
rules:
You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Josephine
rules:
2 Victory
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Molly
rules:
+2 Actions
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Natalie
rules:
You may gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Sylvia
rules:
+2 Coins
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Graverobber
rules: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Junk Dealer
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin
Trash a card from your hand.

name: Mystic
rules:
+1 Action, +2 Coins
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

name: Pillage
rules:
Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.
Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Rebuild
rules:
+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Rogue
rules:
+2 Coins
If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

name: Sir Bailey
rules:
+1 Card, +1 Action
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Destry
rules:
+2 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Michael
rules:
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Vander
rules:
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
When you trash this, gain a Gold.

name: Altar
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Hunting Grounds
rules:
+4 Cards
When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

name: Candlestick Maker
rules:
+1 Action, +1 Buy
 Take a Coin token.

name: Stonemason
rules:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it.
If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

name: Doctor
rules:
Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

name: Masterpiece
rules:
1 Coin
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

name: Advisor
rules:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

name: Herald
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

name: Plaza
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

name: Taxman
rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Baker
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Take a Coin token.
Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

name: Butcher
rules: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

name: Journeyman
rules: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Merchant Guild
rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

name: Soothsayer
rules: Gain a gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

name: Coin of the Realm
rules:
1 Coin
When you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.
Directly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

name: Page
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

name: Peasant
rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

name: Ratcatcher
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.

name: Raze
rules:
+1 Action
Trash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in Coins of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Amulet
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +1 Coin; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

name: Caravan Guard
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Coin.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. 
(+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

name: Dungeon
rules:
+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.

name: Gear
rules:
+2 Cards
Set aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

name: Guide
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

name: Duplicate
rules:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
When you gain a card costing up to 6 Coins, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

name: Magpie
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

name: Messenger
rules:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
You may put your deck into your discard pile.
When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, and each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Miser
rules: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

name: Port
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
When you buy this, gain another Port.

name: Ranger
rules:
+1 Buy
Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.

name: Transmogrify
rules:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin more than it, and put that card into your hand.

name: Artificer
rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Bridge Troll
rules:
Each other player takes his -1 Coin token. Now and at the start of your next turn:
+1 Buy
While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Distant Lands
rules:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
Worth 4 Victory if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 Victory).

name: Giant
rules: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

name: Haunted Woods
rules:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Cards

name: Lost City
rules:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
When you gain this, each other player draws a card.

name: Relic
rules:
2 Coins
When you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Royal Carriage
rules:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
Directly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

name: Storyteller
rules:
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Play up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your Coins; +1 Card per Coin paid.

name: Swamp Hag
rules:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Coins

name: Treasure Trove
rules:
2 Coins
When you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

name: Wine Merchant
rules:
+1 Buy
+4 Coins
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least 2 Coins unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.

name: Hireling
rules:
At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:
+1 Card
(This stays in play.)

name: Soldier
rules:
+2 Coins
+1 Coin per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.
This is not in the Supply.)

name: Fugitive
rules:
+2 Cards
+1Action
Discard a card.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.
(This card is not in the Supply.)

name: Disciple
rules:
You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Teacher
rules:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile you have no tokens on (when you play a card from that pile, you first get that bonus).
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Treasure Hunter
rules:
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Warrior
rules:
+2 Cards
For each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs 3 Coins or 4 Coins.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Hero
rules:
+2 Coins
Gain a Treasure.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Champion
rules:
+1 Action
For the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.
(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

name: Alms
rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Borrow
rules:
+1 Buy
Once per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +1 Coin.

name: Quest
rules: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Save
rules:
+1 Buy
Once per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

name: Scouting Party
rules:
+1 Buy
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back in any order.

name: Travelling Fair
rules:
+2 Buys
When you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.

name: Bonfire
rules: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

name: Expedition
rules: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

name: Ferry
rules: Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but  not less than 0 Coins).

name: Plan
rules: Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

name: Mission
rules: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

name: Pilgrimage
rules: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

name: Ball
rules: Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Raid
rules: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Seaway
rules: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

name: Trade
rules: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

name: Lost Arts
rules: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

name: Training
rules: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

name: Inheritance
rules: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

name: Pathfinding
rules: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

name: Black Market
rules:
+2 Coins, Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order. 
(Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.)
.

name: Envoy
rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

name: Walled Village
rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Governor
rules:
+1 Action
Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin (2 Coins) more.

name: Stash
rules: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.

name: Prince
rules: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4 coins. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

name: Copper
rules: 1 Coin

name: Curse
rules: -1 Victory

name: Estate
rules: 1 Victory

name: Silver
rules: 2 Coins

name: Potion
rules: 1 Potion

name: Duchy
rules: 3 Victory

name: Gold
rules: 3 Coins

name: Province
rules: 6 Victory

name: Platinum
rules: 5 Coins

name: Colony
rules: 10 Victory

name: Copper
rules: 1 Coin.

name: Curse
rules: -1 Victory.

name: Estate
rules: 1 Victory.

name: Silver
rules: 2 Coins.

name: Duchy
rules: 3 Victory.

name: Gold
rules: 3 Coins.

name: Province
rules: 6 Victory.
